---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/delegate/get-flow-status-delegation_activating
---

To refresh the transaction state and get the latest status of the existing flow, use the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/436bd609-48fc-46c4-bde8-1aa921ff2ef5' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `delegation_activating` to `delegation_active`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "436bd609-48fc-46c4-bde8-1aa921ff2ef5",
  "state": "delegation_activating",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2022-10-05T13:45:18.338Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "stake_account_pubkey": "FNN2VwQy5TMkVegyXyejbwKL5S1SvRkmYHkoK62FReo7",
    "create_stake_account_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2fbx1JMeYsTVznPF73GM16Qvchj6VddMZuNDJGcKHa7T1TzQf7zkUSmGwgBqJfK1FyxiKwK1U1nQUTYDLGwDmvE7",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "amount": "1.5",
    "validator_address": "2qa4K3joCUXJXdqgcSmoq1t6KtChfbopm3CJyvVRefQ3",
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "45pgwu5AfFrSfg7UgQ1sXzzFXrS2EWitFbNyXeA7CgwgviNitSoKYCJWSJYwSWN49EZ52aQW1kHzRJfBa7mjUWah",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "delegation_active_amount": "0.0",
    "delegation_inactive_amount": "1497717120.0",
    "delegation_status": "activating",
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "estimated_active_at": "2022-10-05T13:45:18.338Z"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-04T19:05:21.115Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-04T19:18:21.217Z"
}
```

Confirm final state change after `estimated_state_change_at`

```json {3}
{
  "id": "436bd609-48fc-46c4-bde8-1aa921ff2ef5",
  "state": "delegation_active",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "stake_account_pubkey": "FNN2VwQy5TMkVegyXyejbwKL5S1SvRkmYHkoK62FReo7",
    "create_stake_account_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2fbx1JMeYsTVznPF73GM16Qvchj6VddMZuNDJGcKHa7T1TzQf7zkUSmGwgBqJfK1FyxiKwK1U1nQUTYDLGwDmvE7",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "amount": "1.5",
    "validator_address": "2qa4K3joCUXJXdqgcSmoq1t6KtChfbopm3CJyvVRefQ3",
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "45pgwu5AfFrSfg7UgQ1sXzzFXrS2EWitFbNyXeA7CgwgviNitSoKYCJWSJYwSWN49EZ52aQW1kHzRJfBa7mjUWah",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "delegation_active_amount": "1497717120.0",
    "delegation_inactive_amount": "0.0",
    "delegation_status": "active",
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "estimated_active_at": "2022-10-05T13:45:18.338Z"
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-04T19:05:21.115Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-05T14:19:14.886Z"
}
```

### Delegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, your stake is now active and earning rewards!
